nodes.body: Hello! I noticed that you're targeting one of our servicing branches. Please consider updating the version.
Drafting--🤞🏻 that we don't have to service 17.2 before it goes EOL in January.

> Drafting--🤞🏻 that we don't have to service 17.2 before it goes EOL in January.

It's lucky 17.2 has gone to the end of support according to https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/visualstudio/releases/2022/release-history#evergreen-bootstrappers. It's time to close.
